mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT A.*,ROWNUM RN FROM (SELECT RL.REASON_ID, RL.REASON_NAME, RL.STATUS, RL.PROGRESS, RL.BEGIN_DT, RL.END_DT, TO_CHAR(RL.CREATE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss') CREATE_DT, TO_CHAR(RL.UPDATE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss') UPDATE_DT, RL.CREATE_BY, RL.UPDATE_BY, RL.KPI_CODE, RL.PERIOD_TYPE, KL.KPI_NAME, RL.SOURCE FROM UO_REASON_LIST RL,UO_KPI_LIST_CONFIG KL WHERE RL.KPI_CODE=KL.KPI_CODE(+) ORDER BY REASON_ID DESC) A WHERE ROWNUM <=#{endRow} ) WHERE RN >=#{startRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO UO_REASON_LIST ( REASON_ID, REASON_NAME, STATUS, PROGRESS, BEGIN_DT, END_DT, CREATE_DT, UPDATE_DT, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_BY, KPI_CODE, PERIOD_TYPE, SOURCE )VALUES ( #{reasonId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reasonName}, #{status}, #{progress,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{beginDt}, #{endDt}, to_date(#{createDt},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') , to_date(#{updateDt},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') , #{createBy}, #{updateBy}, #{kpiCode}, #{periodType}, #{source} )
INSERT INTO UO_REASON_DETAIL ( REASON_ID, DIM_CODE, DIM_VALUES, DIM_DISPLAY_VALUE )VALUES ( #{primaryKey,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dimCode}, #{dimValues}, #{dimDisplay} )
mapper.delete: delete from UO_REASON_DETAIL t where t.reason_id=#{reasonId}
delete from UO_REASON_KPIS_SNP t where t.reason_id=#{reasonId}
delete from UO_REASON_LIST t where t.reason_id=#{reasonId}
mapper.select: SELECT T.REASON_ID, T.KPI_CODE, T.REASON_NAME, T.BEGIN_DT, T.END_DT, DECODE(T.PERIOD_TYPE,'D','天','月') PERIOD_NAME, T.KPI_CODE, KL.KPI_NAME, T.SOURCE FROM UO_REASON_LIST T, UO_KPI_LIST_CONFIG KL WHERE T.KPI_CODE=KL.KPI_CODE(+) AND T.REASON_ID=#{reasonId}
select DIM_DISPLAY_VALUE from UO_REASON_DETAIL t where reason_id=#{reasonId}

SELECT T1.TEMPLATE_CODE, T1.REASON_KPI_CODE, REASON_KPI_NAME, RELATE_VALUE, DECODE(T2.REASON_ID,NULL,'N','Y') IS_CONCERN FROM (select T.REASON_ID, T.TEMPLATE_CODE, T.REASON_KPI_CODE, T.REASON_KPI_NAME, T.RELATE_VALUE, T.REASON_KPI_ORDER from UO_REASON_KPIS_SNP t WHERE T.TEMPLATE_CODE=#{templateCode} AND T.REASON_ID=#{reasonId}) T1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM UO_REASON_CONCERN WHERE REASON_ID=#{reasonId}) T2 ON T1.REASON_ID=T2.REASON_ID AND T1.TEMPLATE_CODE=T2.TEMPLATE_CODE AND T1.REASON_KPI_CODE=T2.REASON_KPI_CODE ORDER BY REASON_KPI_ORDER ASC

SELECT T1.TEMPLATE_CODE, T1.TEMPLATE_NAME, T1.REASON_KPI_CODE, T1.REASON_KPI_NAME, T1.RELATE_VALUE FROM UO_REASON_KPIS_SNP T1 JOIN UO_REASON_CONCERN T2 ON T1.TEMPLATE_CODE=T2.TEMPLATE_CODE AND T1.REASON_KPI_CODE=T2.REASON_KPI_CODE AND T1.REASON_ID=T2.REASON_ID WHERE T1.REASON_ID=#{reasonId} ORDER BY T1.REASON_KPI_ORDER ASC
